'''Explorer Jack's Dilemma''' is a [[Random World Quest]] that can occur in various places across [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
# Defeat the monsters and save [[Jack]]
# Talk to Jack

==Rewards==
{{Transclude|Random Event|Rewards}}
==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Jack is in trouble.}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(After defeating the monsters)
:'''Jack:''' Thank you Traveler, you saved me!
:'''Jack:''' I never expected there to be monsters here.
:'''Jack:''' I'm just lucky to have run into you. Please, take these for your trouble.
{{Dialogue end}}
